businesses.name: SwingPointMedia
businesses.description: AI Automation and Consulting Agency helping local service-based businesses save $10,000+ annually while attracting ideal customers automatically. We specialize in AI voice agents, content automation, and lead generation systems.
businesses.brandVibe: Knowledgeable, Friendly, Trusted Guide, always on the cutting edge to help improve customers results

founder.name: Jeff Harrison
founder.title: The AI Architect
founder.bio: Since 2010, Jeff has been intrigued with online marketing and how it can connect local businesses with new customers who may never walk into your physical location, yet end up being your best and most profitable customers. He chose Content Marketing as his tool of choice, and now with AI, he's helping businesses architect workflows that make them more efficient and profitable.

process.title: Research
process.description: We reverse engineer it‚Ä¶unless your ideal customers are asking for the answer, we don't waste time, effort or money making it.

process.title: Create
process.description: Now that we have the facts, from the research to back up our content creation decisions, we create the ideal, customers calling you on the phone, type of content.

process.title: Distribute
process.description: The best content created, without a way to ensure your ideal customers, most likely to buy, don't see it, will fail. At SwingPointMedia, your decision making content is waiting for them, so they can call you. Automatically.

process.title: Bonus - Measure
process.description: We are obsessed with the data. We measure everything. Today, if you are doing any marketing and not measuring, it's like walking into a dark room‚Ä¶your toes (budget) are exposed to hitting the leg on the chair‚Ä¶.Ouch.

testimonials.description: No long-term contracts, Results within 30 days

faqs.question: What is content marketing?
faqs.answer: Creating things like blogs, videos and social posts that serve as answers to their ideal customers questions

faqs.question: How long to see results?
faqs.answer: For a typical local business, 6-9 months, unless they already have some online presence.

faqs.question: What AI tools can be used to help my business grow?
faqs.answer: We create automation workflows to help generate consistent content, in addition, AI chatbots for your website and social, AI voice agents for answering incoming calls to eliminate and reduce poor customer service and missed opportunities.

faqs.question: How much can I save with AI automation?
faqs.answer: Our service-based business clients typically save $20,000-$50,000 annually while dramatically improving customer experience and lead conversion.

faqs.question: What industries do you serve?
faqs.answer: We specialize in home services (HVAC, plumbing, electrical), healthcare practices, automotive services, professional services, beauty & wellness, and contractors.

faqs.question: Do you offer free consultations?
faqs.answer: Yes! We offer free AI assessments and consultations to help you understand how AI automation can transform your business operations.
